text: Ezɨ Krais a Godɨn Otarim, a Godɨn gumazamizibagh ativagh men ganam. Egha guizbangɨra Godɨn akamɨn gɨn ghua egha ingangarir kam deravɨra a gami. Eghtɨ e atiatingan koghɨva, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikɨva egh bizir aghuir e iniamiba e dav zuamam, egh kamaghɨn damuva, e uaghan Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn mɨn ikiam.
